name: Pooh Goes For a Swim
description:
You play as Pooh, trying to make your way out of the sewers to the ocean, through three procedurally generated levels. On your way you encounter obstacles that try to harm you, but enemies can be used against each other, and there's also a helpful rat selling you stuff on your way to freedom.

This game was made for the 2018 "A Game By It's Cover" game jam.

The cover it's based on is made by Jose Manuel Cepeda and can be found here: http://famicase.com/12/softs/05.html
